entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries and risk of freezing drizzle. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 4 this evening and minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 8:24 PM EST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning near noon. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. Forecast issued 8:24 PM EST Saturday 21 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 30%
